revised_title: Experiments on the Peruvian Bark: Analyzing the Components and Effects
tldr: The author conducts a series of experiments to analyze the components of Peruvian bark and their effects. The study confirms the medicinal treatment of the bark and reveals the presence of various soluble parts, such as the aromatic, gummy, and resinous substances. The experiments also explore the extraction methods and interactions with other substances, providing insights into the potential uses and improvements of Peruvian bark medicine.
